If it happens right after staging, keep the PAW open for the shuttle cockpit and click “Control from here” after you stage.    Sometimes control jumps from module to module.  
 

If it’s happening randomly, I’m guessing your payload is breaking loose and is now “in control”.    Try switching vessels with [] to see if it jumps to the shuttle.
